data.title: Astrology/Zodiac Signs
data.solution:
birthday = gets.chomp

y, m, d = birthday.split("/").map &:to_i

if m == 3 && d >= 21 || m == 4 && d <= 20
  sun_sign = "Aries"
elsif m == 4 && d >= 21 || m == 5 && d <= 21
  sun_sign = "Taurus"
elsif m == 5 && d >= 22 || m == 6 && d <= 21
  sun_sign = "Gemini"
elsif m == 6 && d >= 22 || m == 7 && d <= 22
  sun_sign = "Cancer"
elsif m == 7 && d >= 23 || m == 8 && d <= 23
  sun_sign = "Leo"
elsif m == 8 && d >= 24 || m == 9 && d <= 23
  sun_sign = "Virgo"
elsif m == 9 && d >= 24 || m == 10 && d <= 23
  sun_sign = "Libra"
elsif m == 10 && d >= 24 || m == 11 && d <= 22
  sun_sign = "Scorpio"
elsif m == 11 && d >= 23 || m == 12 && d <= 21
  sun_sign = "Sagittarius"
elsif m == 12 && d >= 22 || m == 1 && d <= 20
  sun_sign = "Capricorn"
elsif m == 1 && d >= 21 || m == 2 && d <= 19
  sun_sign = "Aquarius"
else
  sun_sign = "Pisces"
end

puts sun_sign
data.statement:
In astrology, your <<Sun Sign>> ("Star Sign"/"Zodiac Sign") is based on the day of the year you were born*.

Given an input [[birthday]] in the format <<yyyy/m/d>>, print which sign in the zodiac this person has as their <<Sun Sign>>. Using the rules below as definitions.

{{Aries}}:  <<March 21 - April 20>>
{{Taurus}}:  <<April 21 - May 21>>
{{Gemini}}:  <<May 22 - June 21>>
{{Cancer}}:  <<June 22 - July 22>>
{{Leo}}:  <<July 23 - August 23>>
{{Virgo}}:  <<August 24 - September 23>>
{{Libra}}:  <<September 24 - October 23>>
{{Scorpio}}:  <<October 24 - November 22>>
{{Sagittarius}}:  <<November 23 - December 21>>
{{Capricorn}}:  <<December 22 - January 20>>
{{Aquarius}}:  <<January 21 - February 19>>
{{Pisces}}:  <<February 20 - March 20>>

* Note: strictly speaking, it can also depend on your birth location and time if you're born near a cut-off, but here we simplify the problem.
data.constraints:
1900 < year of [[birthday]] < 3000 (note: year should not affect your answer)
All [[birthdays]] are valid, there is no need to confirm validity.
data.stubGenerator:
read birthday:string(10)
write Sun Sign

STATEMENT
Zodiac Sign Estimator by StepBack13!
data.outputDescription: <<1 line :>> the corresponding <<Sun Sign>> from the possibilities: {{Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, Pisces}}, according to the dates defined.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

In astrology, your Sun Sign ("Star Sign"/"Zodiac Sign") is based on the day of the year you were born*.

Given an input birthday in the format yyyy/m/d, print which sign in the zodiac this person has as their Sun Sign. Using the rules below as definitions.

Aries: March 21 - April 20
Taurus: April 21 - May 21
Gemini: May 22 - June 21
Cancer: June 22 - July 22
Leo: July 23 - August 23
Virgo: August 24 - September 23
Libra: September 24 - October 23
Scorpio: October 24 - November 22
Sagittarius: November 23 - December 21
Capricorn: December 22 - January 20
Aquarius: January 21 - February 19
Pisces: February 20 - March 20

* Note: strictly speaking, it can also depend on your birth location and time if you're born near a cut-off, but here we simplify the problem.
Input
1 line : a birthday in the format yyyy/m/d (year/month/day)
Output
1 line : the corresponding Sun Sign from the possibilities: Aries, Taurus, Gemini, Cancer, Leo, Virgo, Libra, Scorpio, Sagittarius, Capricorn, Aquarius, Pisces, according to the dates defined.
Constraints
1900 < year of birthday < 3000 (note: year should not affect your answer)
All birthdays are valid, there is no need to confirm validity.
Example
Input
1953/1/1
Output
Capricorn
